summary: Vanilla ENB enchanted with SweetFX and ENB
descriptionHtml:
Hints about my custom quest mod which takes alrdy since january action (current progress 30% i do everything myself,  what i do u can find in the text section)

anyway lets start here.



Yes im back (whatever ^_^) This enb:

Is a PURE Friendly Vanilla Enchantment of the 100% Vanilla Skyrim 

When i have ENB + SweetFX on i mostly just drop 5fps 

also i just made for no good pc ppl an Performence ver.s which disables everything that sucks fps Xd

What ENB you need?

ENB: http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v13713.htm <--------------

-----------

How to install:

Download the v13713 enb vers. extract the "Wrapper Folder" the d3d9.dll file to your skyrim mainfolder which can be found @C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim


After that download my ENb and place also everything from my main folder into C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim

the data folder in my enb folder can you place also C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim

-----------------

What else do i need?

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting by JJC71[/url] Recommend<-------------













Credits goes to:

Boris Vorontsov/ENB Creator
Bethesda Softwork/Skyrim Creators
 JJC71/Project Reality Creator
CeeJay/SweetFX Creator











my New PC specs: 

intel core i7 4770k (3,90ghz)
32 GB Kingston Memory
AMD Radeon HD 7990 6gb


if your pc is better then mine then you can prob. run that also very easy (hahah <.<) 

my very first skyrim specs 

Intel Dual Core 2,4 ghz
Nvidia Gforce 9600 GT 1GB
4GB Memory

then i recommend you play with sweetfx only (disable enb) or sweetfx+performence enb settings (can be found in my folder. you can trust me on that those specs dont even handle everything on high Xd)

----------------

my old medium specs

Intel I5 3,3ghz
AMD Radeon HD 6870 1GT
8GB Memory

then you can probl. and im sure also play max.....

FOR EVERYONE:

If you like to play darker, then just disable the ENB and just play with my ENB Config i remade it to see big difference between enb and sweetfx to make sweetfx darker then enb you probl. can see that also....
author: bardockssj
